sn22.89:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ sambahulā therā bhikkhū kosambiyaṃ viharanti ghositārāme.
sn22.89:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā khemako badarikārāme viharati ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn22.89:4.3: Atha kho therā bhikkhū sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitā āyasmantaṃ dāsakaṃ āmantesuṃ:
sn22.89:4.4: “ehi tvaṃ, āvuso dāsaka, yena khemako bhikkhu tenupasaṅkama;
sn22.89:4.7: kacci te, āvuso, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti no abhikkamanti, paṭikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no abhikkamo’”ti?
sn22.89:4.8: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā dāsako therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭissutvā yenāyasmā khemako tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.89:4.13: “Na me, āvuso, khamanīyaṃ na yāpanīyaṃ … pe …
sn22.89:5.1: Atha kho āyasmā dāsako yena therā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.89:5.6: “Ehi tvaṃ, āvuso dāsaka, yena khemako bhikkhu tenupasaṅkama;
sn22.89:5.9: pañcime, āvuso, upādānakkhandhā vuttā bhagavatā, seyyathidaṃ—
sn22.89:5.11: Imesu āyasmā khemako pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu kiñci attaṃ vā attaniyaṃ vā samanupassatī’”ti?
sn22.89:6.1: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā dāsako therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭissutvā yenāyasmā khemako tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.89:6.7: Imesu āyasmā khemako pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu kiñci attaṃ vā attaniyaṃ vā samanupassatī”ti?
sn22.89:6.11: Imesu khvāhaṃ, āvuso, pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu na kiñci attaṃ vā attaniyaṃ vā samanupassāmī”ti.
sn22.89:7.1: Atha kho āyasmā dāsako yena therā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.89:7.7: Imesu khvāhaṃ, āvuso, pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu na kiñci attaṃ vā attaniyaṃ vā samanupassāmī’”ti.
sn22.89:7.8: “Ehi tvaṃ, āvuso dāsaka, yena khemako bhikkhu tenupasaṅkama;
sn22.89:7.11: pañcime, āvuso, upādānakkhandhā vuttā bhagavatā, seyyathidaṃ—
sn22.89:7.14: No ce kirāyasmā khemako imesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu kiñci attaṃ vā attaniyaṃ vā samanupassati.
sn22.89:8.1: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā dāsako therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭissutvā yenāyasmā khemako … pe …
sn22.89:8.6: no ce kirāyasmā khemako imesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu kiñci attaṃ vā attaniyaṃ vā samanupassati, tenahāyasmā khemako arahaṃ khīṇāsavo”ti.
sn22.89:8.10: Imesu khvāhaṃ, āvuso, pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu na kiñci attaṃ vā attaniyaṃ vā samanupassāmi, na camhi arahaṃ khīṇāsavo;
sn22.89:8.11: api ca me, āvuso, pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu ‘asmī’ti adhigataṃ, ‘ayamahamasmī’ti na ca samanupassāmī”ti.
sn22.89:9.1: Atha kho āyasmā dāsako yena therā bhikkhū … pe …
sn22.89:9.4: pañcime, āvuso, upādānakkhandhā vuttā bhagavatā, seyyathidaṃ—
sn22.89:9.7: Imesu khvāhaṃ, āvuso, pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu na kiñci attaṃ vā attaniyaṃ vā samanupassāmi, na camhi arahaṃ khīṇāsavo;
sn22.89:9.8: api ca me, āvuso, pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu ‘asmī’ti adhigataṃ, ‘ayamahamasmī’ti na ca samanupassāmī”ti.
sn22.89:10.1: “Ehi tvaṃ, āvuso dāsaka, yena khemako bhikkhu tenupasaṅkama;
sn22.89:10.4: yametaṃ, āvuso khemaka, asmīti vadesi, kimetaṃ asmīti vadesi?
sn22.89:10.5: Rūpaṃ asmīti vadesi, aññatra rūpā asmīti vadesi, vedanaṃ …
sn22.89:10.8: viññāṇaṃ asmīti vadesi, aññatra viññāṇā asmīti vadesi.
sn22.89:11.1: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā dāsako therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭissutvā yenāyasmā khemako tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.89:11.10: Yametaṃ, āvuso khemaka, ‘asmī’ti vadesi, kimetaṃ ‘asmī’ti vadesī”ti?
sn22.89:12.1: Atha kho āyasmā khemako daṇḍamolubbha yena therā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami;
sn22.89:12.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn22.89:12.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ khemakaṃ therā bhikkhū etadavocuṃ:
sn22.89:12.11: Yametaṃ, āvuso khemaka, ‘asmī’ti vadesi, kimetaṃ ‘asmī’ti vadesī”ti?
sn22.89:12.19: Api ca me, āvuso, pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu ‘asmī’ti adhigataṃ ‘ayamahamasmī’ti na ca samanupassāmi.
sn22.89:13.1: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, uppalassa vā padumassa vā puṇḍarīkassa vā gandho.
sn22.89:13.3: ‘pattassa gandho’ti vā ‘vaṇṇassa gandho’ti vā ‘kiñjakkhassa gandho’ti vā sammā nu kho so vadamāno vadeyyā”ti?
sn22.89:13.6: “‘Pupphassa gandho’ti kho, āvuso, sammā byākaramāno byākareyyā”ti.
sn22.89:13.7: “Evameva khvāhaṃ, āvuso, na rūpaṃ ‘asmī’ti vadāmi, napi aññatra rūpā ‘asmī’ti vadāmi.
sn22.89:13.11: na viññāṇaṃ ‘asmī’ti vadāmi, napi aññatra viññāṇā ‘asmī’ti vadāmi.
sn22.89:13.12: Api ca me, āvuso, pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu ‘asmī’ti adhigataṃ ‘ayamahamasmī’ti na ca samanupassāmi.
sn22.89:14.1: Kiñcāpi, āvuso, ariyasāvakassa pañcorambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni bhavanti, atha khvassa hoti:
sn22.89:14.2: ‘yo ca pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu anusahagato asmīti māno, asmīti chando, asmīti anusayo asamūhato.
sn22.89:14.3: So aparena samayena pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassī viharati—
sn22.89:14.4: iti rūpaṃ, iti rūpassa samudayo, iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo;
sn22.89:14.8: iti viññāṇaṃ, iti viññāṇassa samudayo, iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo’ti.
sn22.89:14.9: Tassimesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassino viharato yopissa hoti pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu anusahagato ‘asmī’ti, māno ‘asmī’ti, chando ‘asmī’ti anusayo asamūhato, sopi samugghātaṃ gacchati.
sn22.89:15.3: Tamenaṃ rajako ūse vā khāre vā gomaye vā sammadditvā acche udake vikkhāleti.
sn22.89:15.4: Kiñcāpi taṃ hoti vatthaṃ parisuddhaṃ pariyodātaṃ, atha khvassa hoti yeva anusahagato ūsagandho vā khāragandho vā gomayagandho vā asamūhato.
sn22.89:15.7: Yopissa hoti anusahagato ūsagandho vā khāragandho vā gomayagandho vā asamūhato, sopi samugghātaṃ gacchati.
sn22.89:15.8: Evameva kho, āvuso, kiñcāpi ariyasāvakassa pañcorambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni bhavanti, atha khvassa hoti yeva pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu anusahagato ‘asmī’ti, māno ‘asmī’ti, chando ‘asmī’ti anusayo asamūhato.
sn22.89:15.9: So aparena samayena pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassī viharati.
sn22.89:15.10: ‘Iti rūpaṃ, iti rūpassa samudayo, iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo;
sn22.89:15.14: iti viññāṇaṃ, iti viññāṇassa samudayo, iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo’ti.
sn22.89:15.15: Tassa imesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassino viharato yopissa hoti pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu anusahagato ‘asmī’ti, māno ‘asmī’ti, chando ‘asmī’ti anusayo asamūhato, sopi samugghātaṃ gacchatī”ti.
sn22.89:16.1: Evaṃ vutte, therā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ khemakaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn22.89:16.2: “na kho mayaṃ āyasmantaṃ khemakaṃ vihesāpekhā pucchimha, api cāyasmā khemako pahosi tassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ vitthārena ācikkhituṃ desetuṃ paññāpetuṃ paṭṭhapetuṃ vivarituṃ vibhajituṃ uttānīkātuṃ.
sn22.89:16.3: Tayidaṃ āyasmatā khemakena tassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ vitthārena ācikkhitaṃ desitaṃ paññāpitaṃ paṭṭhapitaṃ vivaritaṃ vibhajitaṃ uttānīkatan”ti.
sn22.89:17.2: Attamanā therā bhikkhū āyasmato khemakassa bhāsitaṃ abhinanduṃ.
sn22.89:17.3: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne saṭṭhimattānaṃ therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsu, āyasmato khemakassa cāti.
